PrivacyPolicyIntro: This policy has been prepared to help you understand the nature of the data we collect from you when you visit our website and how we handle this personal information.
PrivacyPolicy_Browsing_Text: This website is not designed to collect your personal information from your computer while browsing. Any data used will only be the information you provide voluntarily and knowingly.
PrivacyPolicy_IP_Text: Whenever you visit any website, including this one, the hosting server logs your IP address, the date and time of your visit, the type of browser you use, and the URL of any website that referred you to this site.
PrivacyPolicy_Surveys_Text: Online surveys we conduct allow us to collect specific data such as your opinions and feelings about our website. Your responses are highly valuable and appreciated, as they help us improve our website. You are free to provide your name and any other optional information.
PrivacyPolicy_Links_Text: Our website may contain links to other websites or advertisements from third-party sites. We are not responsible for the data collection methods used by those websites. You can review the privacy policies and content of any websites accessed through links on our site.
Terms_Intro: The Digital Solutions Dimensions website and all its associated services and sub-sites are provided for your personal use. Your access and use of this website are subject to the terms and conditions of use and the applicable regulations in the Kingdom. Accessing or using the website constitutes full and unconditional acceptance of these terms, whether you are a registered user or not. This acceptance becomes effective from the date of your first use of the website.
Terms_Modification: Any modification to these terms becomes effective immediately upon announcement, unless stated otherwise. Your continued use of the website after any modification is announced constitutes full acceptance of that modification.
Terms_Restrictions_Text1: Uploading or submitting files that contain software, materials, data, or other information that you do not own or are not licensed to use.
Terms_Restrictions_Text2: Uploading or submitting files that contain viruses, corrupted data, or any malicious software, or performing any action that may affect the security, integrity, or availability of information on the website.
Terms_Restrictions_Text3: Publishing, advertising, distributing, or circulating materials or information that defame others, violate laws, or contain pornographic, obscene, or Islamic law–violating content, or any illegal materials through Digital Solutions Dimensions services.
Terms_Restrictions_Text4: Using any tool, program, or procedure to intercept or attempt to intercept the proper operation of the Digital Solutions Dimensions website.
Terms_Restrictions_Text5: Performing any action that imposes an unreasonable, excessive, or inappropriate load on the infrastructure of the Digital Solutions Dimensions website.
Terms_Restrictions_Text6: Any act that constitutes a violation of the Anti–Cyber Crime Law or any related regulations in the Kingdom.
